hero_notes: Growth - Use a free action to activate or deactivate your growth at the start of your turn. When active Growth grants you the following:
Growth - 1) +4in Move and +2in Reach 2) +1D to melee attack rolls 3) attack flying models as if they were on the ground.
Growth - You're large enough to serve as a 'mount' for one normal sized or shrunken model. Riders use 1in of their Move value to climb aboard or dismount when in base contact with you.
Growth - Foes also gain +1D on Body-based ranged attacks against you.

hero_archetype_list.description: Some supers do not fit into easy categories. That is where this archetype comes in! You possess a dynamic mix of minor powers that give you a wide array of options in any super slugfest.

hero_minor_power_list.description: You can grow to giant size!
notes: Growth - Use a free action to activate or deactivate your growth at the start of your turn. When active Growth grants you the following:
Growth - 1) +4in Move and +2in Reach 2) +1D to melee attack rolls 3) attack flying models as if they were on the ground.
Growth - You're large enough to serve as a 'mount' for one normal sized or shrunken model. Riders use 1in of their Move value to climb aboard or dismount when in base contact with you.
Growth - Foes also gain +1D on Body-based ranged attacks against you.
